t: Amazon Aggregator Society Brands Raises $205 Million, Sees More Acquisitions In The Pipeline
s: March 28, 2022 - Tech-enabled consumer products firm Society Brands, which acquires e-commerce native brands that primarily sell on Amazon and their own DTC sites, said it completed a capital raise of $205 million, led by i80 Group, and also has acquired a brand management company.

t: What is an Amazon aggregator? Society Brands raises $204 million with goal of being an e-commerce ‘Procter & Gamble’ - cleveland.com
s: June 6, 2024 - Society Brands is an Amazon aggregator that brought in $204 million of venture capital in March. It’s one of the largest deals a startup in Ohio has made, and CEO Michael Sirpilla said they’re ready to put that money to work.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
